name: Unseen (KineOlsen96, TeresaGJ)
description:
Unseen is a game about a homeless chameleon. Play through to see some of the issues of living out in the streets.

Game is made Playing in Traffic Production:

Kine Rammen Olsen - Team lead, programmer and UI art
Jens Christian Saltvedt Haarstad - Lead programmer
Solveig Jotun Losnegard - Lead artist
Teresa Gonzalez Johnsen - Programming and sound
